display_html:
data Block = Block {
  • header :: BlockHeader
  • messages :: [Message]
}
name: Block Block header messages

display_html:
data BlockHeader = BlockHeader {
  • version :: Word16
  • contentSize :: Word32
  • slot :: SlotId
  • chainLength :: Word32
  • contentHash :: Hash "content"
  • headerHash :: Hash "BlockHeader"
  • parentHeaderHash :: Hash "BlockHeader"
  • producedBy :: Maybe PoolId
}
name: BlockHeader BlockHeader version contentSize slot chainLength contentHash headerHash parentHeaderHash producedBy

display_html:
data ConfigParam
  • = Block0Date StartTime
  • | Discrimination NetworkDiscriminant
  • | Consensus ConsensusVersion
  • | SlotsPerEpoch EpochLength
  • | SlotDuration NominalDiffTime
  • | EpochStabilityDepth (Quantity "block" Word32)
  • | ConsensusGenesisPraosParamF Milli
  • | MaxNumberOfTransactionsPerBlock Word32
  • | BftSlotsRatio Milli
  • | AddBftLeader LeaderId
  • | RemoveBftLeader LeaderId
  • | AllowAccountCreation Bool
  • | ConfigLinearFee FeePolicy
  • | ProposalExpiration (Quantity "epoch" Word32)
  • | KesUpdateSpeed (Quantity "second/update" Word32)
  • | UnimplementedConfigParam Word16
name: ConfigParam Block0Date Discrimination Consensus SlotsPerEpoch SlotDuration EpochStabilityDepth ConsensusGenesisPraosParamF MaxNumberOfTransactionsPerBlock BftSlotsRatio AddBftLeader RemoveBftLeader AllowAccountCreation ConfigLinearFee ProposalExpiration KesUpdateSpeed UnimplementedConfigParam

display_html:
data Message
  • = Initial [ConfigParam]
  • | Transaction (Tx, [TxWitness])
  • | StakeDelegation (PoolId, ChimericAccount, Tx, [TxWitness])
  • | UnimplementedMessage Int
name: Message Transaction Initial StakeDelegation UnimplementedMessage

display_html:
newtype ApiT a = ApiT {
  • getApiT :: a
}
name: ApiT ApiT getApiT

display_html:
data ApiStakeDistribution = ApiStakeDistribution {
  • dangling :: ApiT (Quantity "lovelace" Word64)
  • pools :: [(ApiT PoolId, ApiT (Quantity "lovelace" Word64))]
  • unassigned :: ApiT (Quantity "lovelace" Word64)
}
name: ApiStakeDistribution ApiStakeDistribution pools dangling unassigned

display_html:
data JormungandrClient m = JormungandrClient {
  • getTipId :: ExceptT ErrNetworkUnavailable m (Hash "BlockHeader")
  • getBlock :: Hash "BlockHeader" -> ExceptT ErrGetBlock m Block
  • getDescendantIds :: Hash "BlockHeader" -> Word -> ExceptT ErrGetDescendants m [Hash "BlockHeader"]
  • postMessage :: (Tx, [TxWitness]) -> ExceptT ErrPostTx m ()
  • getInitialBlockchainParameters :: Hash "Genesis" -> ExceptT ErrGetBlockchainParams m (Block, BlockchainParameters)
  • getStakeDistribution :: ExceptT ErrNetworkUnavailable m StakeApiResponse
}
name: JormungandrClient JormungandrClient $sel:getBlock:JormungandrClient $sel:getInitialBlockchainParameters:JormungandrClient $sel:getStakeDistribution:JormungandrClient $sel:getTipId:JormungandrClient $sel:postMessage:JormungandrClient $sel:getDescendantIds:JormungandrClient
